mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{user_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(user_id, product_id, product_title, price, quantity) values(#{user_id},#{product_id},#{product_title},#{price},#{quantity})
mapper.update: update cart set quantity=#{quantity} WHERE user_id = #{user_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
